#### Load Libraries
```{r}
library(tidyverse) #for data manipulation
library(here) #for unbreakable file paths
library(maps)
library(mapdata)
```

#### Read-in Data
```{r}
intertidal <- read_csv(here("Week_09","Data", "intertidaldata.csv")) #read in inter tidal data
tidal_lat <- read_csv(here("Week_09","Data", "intertidaldata_latitude.csv")) #read in inter tidal latitude data

states<-map_data("state")
```

#### Data Manipulation
```{r}
CA <- states %>%
  filter(region == "california") #filter out CA data

southCA_lat <- tidal_lat %>%
  filter(Site== "Scripps")

scripps_tidal <- intertidal %>%
   filter(Site== "Scripps")
```

#### Create Plot
```{r site_map}
#Plot 1: Map of Site
ggplot()+
  geom_polygon(data = CA, 
               aes(x = long, 
                   y = lat),
               color= "black",
               fill= "darkolivegreen4") +
  geom_point(data = southCA_lat, # add a point at all my sites for sea star obs sites
             aes(x = -117.25,
                 y = Latitude),
             fill= "goldenrod",
             color= "black",
             size= 4,
             shape= 21) +
  coord_map() +
  theme_void()
```
